original_text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit to Galilee, and a report about him went out through all the surrounding country.
korean_text: 예수께서 성령의 능력으로 갈릴리에 돌아가시니 그 소문이 사방에 퍼졌고

sentences.original_text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit to Galilee
and a report about him went out through all the surrounding country.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 대한 소문이 온 사방으로 퍼져나갔습니다
